description: Demonstrates pointer usage and address printing
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: PointerBasics.c
Compile: gcc PointerBasics.c -o PointerBasics
Run: ./PointerBasics
output:
Value of a = 10
Address of a = (some address)
Pointer ptr = (same address)
Value using pointer *ptr = 10

description: Swaps two numbers using pointer function
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: SwapPointers.c
Compile: gcc SwapPointers.c -o SwapPointers
Run: ./SwapPointers
output:
Before Swap: a=10 b=20
After Swap: a=20 b=10
